sentences.en: "The matter is closed," was the curt reply.
sentences.cn: 得到的答复简短而无礼：“事情已经结束了。”

sentences.en: He dismissed me with a curt " No ".
sentences.cn: 他简单地说声 “ 不要了 ” 就辞了我.

sentences.en: He dismissed them with a curt nod.
sentences.cn: 他只随便点了一下头就把他们打发走了.

sentences.en: He gave me a curt answer.
sentences.cn: 他用简慢的态度三言两语地回答我.

sentences.en: He gave me an extremely curt answer.
sentences.cn: 他对我作了极为草率的答复.

sentences.en: He rapped out a series of curt commands.
sentences.cn: 他大声发出了一连串简短的命令.

sentences.en: He was curt and to the point without being rude or insulting.
sentences.cn: 他说话简单扼要,一语中的,既不粗俗,也不盛气凌人.

sentences.en: He was very curt and very brisk.
sentences.cn: 他汇报得非常简短、非常干脆.

sentences.en: He's rather curt when he's angry.
sentences.cn: 他生气时不免有些失礼.

sentences.en: Her tone of voice was curt.
sentences.cn: 她说话的语气唐突无礼。

sentences.en: His remark was brief without being curt.
sentences.cn: 他的话简单而不草率无礼.

sentences.en: His tone was curt and unfriendly.
sentences.cn: 他说话的语调粗暴无礼。

sentences.en: I was a little curt with him, ie spoke sharply to him.
sentences.cn: 我有点冒犯了他(言语尖刻).

sentences.en: The dismissal is curt but not fierce.
sentences.cn: 打发他走的吩咐是粗率的,但并不凶.

sentences.en: With a curt nod, he turned away and sat down.
sentences.cn: 他简慢地点点头就转身坐下了。

trans.tran_cn: 简短的，三言两语的，草率的，敷衍了事的
trans.tran_en: using very few words in a way that seems rude

trans.tran_cn: (Curt)人名；(法)屈尔；(英)柯特；(德、西、芬、罗、瑞典)库尔特
